message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $70, you take $30. It's a good deal for you in the first round!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This offer is fairer in the long run.
Bob, it's my turn, and time is running out for both of us. This is my final offer - take it or leave it!
Alice, this is my last offer. It's the best you'll get considering the inflation.
